wikiData.title: Ake v. Oklahoma
wikiData.Prior: On appeal from the Court of Criminal Appeals of Oklahoma
wikiData.Holding: An [[indigent]] [[criminal defendant]] in a murder case where the [[death penalty]] could be assessed had a right to have the state provide a [[psychiatric]] evaluation to be used in the defendant's behalf.
wikiData.JoinMajority: Brennan, White, Blackmun, Powell, Stevens, O'Connor
wikiData.LawsApplied: [[Fourteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution|U.S. Const. amend. XIV]]
